vision.notes: Sensory capabilities related to sight in Callochitonidae are currently unknown based on the provided information.

chemoreception.notes: As members of Chitonida, Callochitonidae likely possess chemoreceptors for detecting chemical cues in their environment. Specific chemoreception modalities are unknown.

mechanoreception.notes: As members of Chitonida, Callochitonidae likely possess mechanoreceptors for detecting tactile and proprioceptive stimuli. Specific mechanoreception modalities are unknown.
